results.title: KCNJ16-depleted kidney organoids recapitulate tubulopathy and lipid recovery upon statins treatment.
results.text_hl: Preclinical studies provided mechanistic links between @GENE_KCNJ16 @GENE_3773 @@@Kir5.1@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_SeSAME_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C557674 @@@tubulopathy@@@, however, the disease pathology remains poorly understood.
